name: cypress-web-api-testing
description: Cypress Web and API Testing Framework

scripts.report:merge:api: mochawesome-merge api/reports/mocha/*.json > api/reports/mocha/combined.json || echo 'No API reports to merge'
scripts.report:merge:web: mochawesome-merge web/reports/mocha/*.json > web/reports/mocha/combined.json || echo 'No Web reports to merge'
scripts.report:merge:all: mochawesome-merge api/reports/mocha/*.json web/reports/mocha/*.json > reports/combined.json || echo 'No reports to merge'
scripts.report:generate:api: marge api/reports/mocha/combined.json --reportDir api/reports/mocha --reportFilename index --inline --charts --reportTitle "API Test Results"
scripts.report:generate:web: marge web/reports/mocha/combined.json --reportDir web/reports/mocha --reportFilename index --inline --charts --reportTitle "Web UI Test Results"
scripts.report:generate:all: marge reports/combined.json --reportDir reports --reportFilename combined_results --inline --charts --reportTitle "Combined Test Results - API and Web Tests"
